channel.title: New aryan and scripts work but...... need aryan proxy help
channel.description:
everybode must be like oh thank god aryan is back and all the scrips work but have u all forgot about "hmmm how am i going to proxy this" duhh lol so can anyone help me proxy this [u]new aryan[/u] ty and dont give me the old switch to this Code: @echo off title Running Bot java -DsocksProxyHost=12.345.678.910 -DsocksProxyPort=1234 -noverify -Xmx500m -cp .;./OUTPUT;./OUTPUT/unrenamed.jar;./BotClasses; Bot pause
it does not work with the new aryan

item.title: New aryan and scripts work but...... need aryan proxy help
item.dc:creator: @sk8nguitar sk8nguitar
item.description:
@sk8nguitar wrote:

Your code is a little differnt then mine but pretty much the same. Anyway this ist he code i use and it works im using it right now acually on 376.

@echo off title Aryan Proxy 1 - Running java -DsocksProxyHost=xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx -DsocksProxyPort=xxxx -noverify -Xmx500m -cp .;./OUTPUT;./OUTPUT/unrenamed.jar;./BotClasses;./LIB; Bot %1 pause

Copy and paste that with your proxy and it should work because its working ok for me :D. Unless your not using aryan from mopars updater then it might be differnt…

Read full topic

item.title: New aryan and scripts work but...... need aryan proxy help
item.dc:creator: @inevitable65 inevitable65
item.description:
@inevitable65 wrote:

imp’s aryan has
start javaw -noverify -Xmx500m -cp output.jar Bot %1
and
@echo off
title www.impsoft.net
java -noverify -Xmx500m -cp output.jar Bot %1
pause

how can u proxy that mopar?

Read full topic

item.title: New aryan and scripts work but...... need aryan proxy help
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

no, you dont understand, this code will never change:

-DsocksProxyHost=IP -DsocksProxyPort=port

you always put it right after java or javaw

Read full topic
item.source: New aryan and scripts work but...... need aryan proxy help

item.title: New aryan and scripts work but...... need aryan proxy help
item.dc:creator: @yna_ajhear5 yna_ajhear5
item.description:
@yna_ajhear5 wrote:

Mopar i’m sorry, but your wrong. If you use IMP’s Aryan it changed.
It’s now
@echo off
title Running Bot
start javaw -DsocksProxyHost=IP -DsocksProxyPort=port -noverify -Xmx500m -cp output.jar Bot %1
pause

Had to change the output source and the bot %1 thing. I dunno why, I did it myself. Seems not many people know how to look at two things and merge them.

Read full topic
